name: Lucky Roll
description:
Uh-oh! looks like the coins and the cards want you gone! There's two ways you can go with this, you can either fight, or roll outta there!

Contents:

  • 4 enemies of varying strength, 3 of them having unique attack styles
  • 2 powerups to change up your attacks
  • ...that's all? I thought there was more to this game...
